snippet: The Pentagon announced on Thursday that women would be formally allowed to take on dangerous jobs closer to the front lines.
abstract: The Pentagon announced on Thursday that women would be formally allowed to take on dangerous jobs closer to the front lines.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon announced on Thursday that women would be formally allowed to take on dangerous jobs closer to the front lines. The decision reflects the evolving role of American women in war but stops short of allowing them to serve in combat, Elisabeth Bumiller reports in Friday's Times:

headline.main: Pentagon to Loosen Restrictions on Women in Combat

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
